articles.title: Derby dad who feared he wouldn't live to see 40 or his new baby born quits smoking - Derbyshire Live
articles.description: He was diagnosed with a smoking-related illness
articles.content: Derby dad-of-four Jodie Clarke, 37, was scared he wouldn't live to see his fifth child born or reach the age of 40 after being diagnosed with emphysema a progressive lung condition that is a form of … [+3613 chars]

articles.title: Stoptober 2023: What going alcohol-free does to your body - BBC Science Focus
articles.description: Going sober can positively impact your health. A doctor explains what happens when you stop drinking over days, weeks, months and years.
articles.content:
Embarking on a journey of sobriety can have profound effects on your body, leading to positive changes over days, weeks, months, and years. 
Let's explore this transformative process and its impact … [+3104 chars]
